message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This unique item is not just an object but a symbol of excellence and innovation. Considering its exceptional features and unparalleled craftsmanship, we believe it's worth more than its face value. To extend this opportunity to you, I am offering the product for $15000.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the asking price of $15000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your decision. In light of your counteroffer, I am proposing a revised price of $12000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise that aims to honor the value of the item while considering your budgetary constraints.
